title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1003.1 - Applicability of this Part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1003.1 - Applicability of this Part

State Regulations

The provisions contained in this Part are applicable to
each of the authorities listed in section
1000.1
of this Title, except the

Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority ("TBTA"). For information concerning
travel via the facilities of the TBTA, refer to Subchapter B, Part 1021, of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1003.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
